[!// [!/* Select MODULE-CONFIGURATION as context-node */!][!// [!SELECT "as:modconf('Dio')"!][!// DIO Driver Details

 

/*****************************************DIO HW-SW MAP*****************************************/

[!IF "(DioSafety/DioInitCheckApi = 'true')"!][!// [!ENDIF!] [!IF "(DioGeneral/DioVersionInfoApi = 'true')"!][!// [!ENDIF!] [!IF "(DioGeneral/DioFlipChannelApi = 'true')"!][!// [!ENDIF!]
Table 1: DIO SFR Usage per API
API Name SFRs Used Remarks
Dio_Init - No SFRs used
Dio_InitCheck - No SFRs used
Dio_GetVersionInfo - No SFRs used
Dio_ReadChannel Pn_IN -
Dio_WriteChannel Pn_OMR -
Dio_ReadPort Pn_IN -
Dio_WritePort Pn_OUT -
Dio_ReadChannelGroup Pn_IN -
Dio_WriteChannelGroup Pn_OMR -
Dio_FlipChannel Pn_IN, Pn_OMR -

 

/******************************************DIO MPU Settings******************************************/

For MPU setting wrt SFR, refer HW manual for Port module

[!IF "(DioGeneral/DioDevErrorDetect = 'true')"!][!// [!ENDIF!]
Table 2: DIO Memory Range
Start Address End Address Remarks
DIO_START_SEC_VAR_8BIT DIO_START_SEC_VAR_8BIT Dio_InitStatus - 8 bit variable used by DIO driver
DIO_START_SEC_VAR_32BIT DIO_STOP_SEC_VAR_32BIT

Dio_kConfigPtr - 32 bit variables used by DIO driver
